title: U.S. bans govt. employees from travel to Mexican beach resort
text:
U.S. bans govt. employees from travel to Mexican beach resort Friday, March 09, 2018 - 01:22 
Citing a new security threat in Mexico's Caribbean beach resort of Playa del Carmen, the U.S. government is prohibiting its employees from traveling there, marking another blow to the battered reputations of the country's most popular tourist hubs. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
